lyrics:
[00:00.00] Intro
[00:05.00] Thunder roars across the blackened sky
[00:10.00] Warriors march as kingdoms fall and die
[00:15.00] Steel and fire clash in endless night
[00:20.00] We stand together ready for the fight

[00:25.00] Chorus
[00:26.00] Rise from the ashes
[00:30.00] Scream into the void
[00:35.00] Nothing can break us
[00:40.00] We won't be destroyed

[00:45.00] Verse
[00:50.00] Chains of fate try to hold us down
[00:55.00] But we're breaking free we'll take the crown
[01:00.00] Blood and honor fuel our burning rage
[01:05.00] This is our moment this is our stage

[01:10.00] Chorus
[01:11.00] Rise from the ashes
[01:15.00] Scream into the void
[01:20.00] Nothing can break us
[01:25.00] We won't be destroyed
